column2:
'1. The client signs in to Azure AD and gets an Azure Resource Manager token.'
'2. The client presents the token to Azure Resource Manager and to all Azure Machine'
'Learning.'
'3. Azure Machine Learning provides a Machine Learning service token to the user'
'compute target (for example, Azure Machine Learning compute cluster). This token'
'is used y the user compute target to call ack into the Machine Learning service'
'after the jo is complete. The scope is limited to the workspace.'
